data.value: Manage T Level results

data.name: Page_Title
data.value: Manage T Level results

data.name: Para_For_Security_Reasons_You_Should_Always_Signout
data.value: For security reasons you should always sign out when you have finished using the service. Select ‘Sign out’ in the top right-hand corner of the screen to sign out and return to the 'Start' page.

data.name: Para_Manage_TLevel_Results_Is_Run_By
data.value: Manage T Level results is run by the Education and Skills Funding Agency (ESFA), an executive agency of the Department for Education (DfE).

data.name: Para_This_Service_IsFor
data.value: This service is for awarding organisations and providers who deliver T Level qualifications.

data.name: Para_User_Can_Be_Given_More_Than_One_Role
data.value: A user can be given more than one role. More details on the roles in this service can be read below.

data.name: Para_You_Will_Be_Signed_Out
data.value: You will be signed out if you are inactive for 30 minutes.
